title: [Vornavian Coast, North Beach]
description: A large pool of salt water gathers here, slightly inland from the crashing tides but still away from the cliffs to the east.  The pool apparently fills at high tide, but is not touched by the ocean at low tide.

A large pool of salt water gathers here, slightly inland from the crashing tides but still away from the cliffs to the east.  The pool apparently fills at high tide, but is not touched by the ocean at low tide.  Crabs dance around the edge of the pool, scurrying away from seagulls which land nearby looking for a meal.
